meaningMnemonic: You're walking down the street when you see <radical>twenty</radical> <radical>big</radical> <radical>cross</radical>es lined up in front of you. Crosses creep you out and this is way too many for you to keep walking so you decide to <kanji>run</kanji> as fast as you can to get past them.
readingMnemonic: You figure since you're already on the <kanji>run</kanji> that you might as well <reading>hone</reading> (ほん) your running skills while you make your way down this scary, cross lined street.
